display_long_description:
[media]


**Raise Dino**

Hatch egg. Cute and small. Name dino, maybe GRUG, maybe dumb name. Dino spin, follow, roll over. Feed dino. Chicken? Pig? Friend? Dino big now. Ride dino. You control. 

[media]

**Fight Big Boss**

Climb volcano. Explore cave. Big treasure! Maybe danger? No scared. Brave! Fight with friend. Push friend off cliff. Laugh? 


**Play with Friend**

No dino? Ride on friend dino! Want fight friend? Bring weapon. Want fight all friends? Bring big weapon. 

[media]

**Wear New Loincloth**

Old loincloth ugly. New loincloth pretty. UG sexy now? Find other new clothes, change how UG look. 

**More Content**

New update many time. New fun. New dino. New better. New bug? UG proud of bug. UG proud of UG. 
Join tribe discord.gg/ugvr.
